content.rendered:
Here are the video tutorials for JARVEE – the best social media automation software today. Check them out and see how powerful JARVEE really is!

1. Overview

Here’s an overview of how JARVEE looks like and what you can do with it. We’ll talk about all the different sections of the software, what each of them does and how you can use it to your advantage. You’ll see how easy it is to use the best social media automation software and become a pro.

2. Adding Social Profiles

Now you’ll learn how to add your social platforms to JARVEE, the different ways of adding them and what other extra options you can set when adding them in order to take full advantage of JARVEE. You’ll also see the full list of what platforms JARVEE supports.

3. Posting to Your Social Profiles

In this short video tutorial you will learn how to post to your social profiles. How to create your first campaign, how to create a destination list and what it’s used for and how to set your campaign up so it posts automatically for you. Also you’ll see all the different ways of adding new posts.

4. Automating Your Account’s Growth

Now this is where it gets interesting. You’ll learn how to automate your account’s growth by setting up the follow, unfollow and follow back tools. These tools will run continuously on your account and using the settings you picked they will start growing your account with new followers daily.

5. Expanding Your Social Reach

In this video you will learn how to take care of groups. Be it for Facebook, G+ or Linkedin, you will learn how to automatically look for new groups, join or unjoin them. Add them to an ignore list and use them so you can market your sites or social profiles better.

6. Getting More Attention to Your Account

Let’s talk now about 2 very powerful tools that will help you bring a lot of attention to your accounts. Namely the Comment, Like and Contact tools. With these you will be able to automatically interact with a lot of other accounts that will want to check your account back and see who you are.

7. Adding Content to Your Accounts on Auto-Pilot

Now you’ll see how easy it is to set your accounts to always have fresh content at the exact times you want it posted. You will be able to get very high quality content via retweet for Twitter, repin for Pinterest or repost for Instagram. Choose good sources for this and you’ll get amazing content.
